resources.string: Denji, a poor young man, makes a contract with Pochita, the Chainsaw Demon, and becomes a human-demon hybrid with the ability to transform parts of his body into chainsaws.

Chihiro Rokuhira, a young man, after a tragic incident, decides to follow in his fathers footsteps and become a katana blacksmith, seeking revenge for his fathers murder and the loss of six enchanted blades.

Momo Ayase, a high school student who believes in ghosts, and Ken Takakura (nicknamed Okarun), who is obsessed with aliens. They decide to prove their beliefs are real and get involved in a supernatural adventure against yōkai and aliens.

Takezo Shinmen, a wild and violent young man, struggles to find his place in a world filled with war and violence. After being severely injured, he adopts the name Miyamoto Musashi and begins a journey to become the greatest swordsman in Japan.

Gabimaru, an experienced shinobi, is sentenced to death but is given a chance to earn his freedom by searching for the Elixir of Life on a mysterious island. However, the island is filled with dangerous creatures, and the mission becomes a fight for survival.

In a world where hunters battle dangerous monsters, Jinwoo is the weakest of all. After a near-death experience, he gains the ability to level up and becomes one of the most powerful hunters, embarking on a journey to uncover the secrets of the dungeon system.

Boruto Uzumaki, the son of Naruto Uzumaki, seeks to follow his own path and prove himself as a ninja. However, he struggles with the expectations placed on him and faces various challenges as he tries to step out of his father’s shadow.

Thorfinn, a young warrior, seeks revenge on the man who killed his father, the legendary Viking warrior Thors. As he travels with a band of mercenaries, he becomes embroiled in the violent history of medieval Europe, learning about war, honor, and revenge.

Guts, a lone mercenary with a tragic past, fights against demons and human enemies alike in a dark and violent medieval world. With a huge sword and a relentless will to survive, he seeks revenge on Griffith, a former comrade who betrayed him and destroyed his life.
This Is How Love Starts, Did You Know?!
